coachDashboard.title: Coach Dashboard
coachDashboard.subtitle: Manage your coaching sessions and connect with your clients

accountPending.title: Account Pending Approval
accountPending.message: Your coach application is currently under review. You'll be notified once an admin approves your profile. In the meantime, you can update your profile information and prepare for your coaching journey!

accountRejected.title: Application Not Approved
accountRejected.message: Unfortunately, your coach application was not approved. Please contact support for more information or to resubmit your application with updated credentials.

coachDashboard.noConversationsApproved: You don't have any active conversations yet. Clients will be able to contact you once they find your profile.
coachDashboard.noConversationsPending: Once your profile is approved, clients will be able to find and contact you.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

errors.coachNotFound: Coach not found or not available

pageError.title: Something went wrong!
pageError.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Our team has been notified and is working on a fix.

globalError.title: Critical Error
